description: This file is a test suite for the UserService interface, demonstrating the use of mocktail for mocking dependencies and verifying interactions within tests.

classes.name: UserService
classes.description: A minimal abstract class representing a user service with a method to fetch greetings.

classes.name: MockUserService
classes.description: A mock class extending Mock and implementing UserService for testing purposes.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point of the test suite, setting up and running test groups for UserService using mocktail.
